name: Space Hunter (mistova)
description:
2d space shooter game. Have fun.

Modifications:

Added goal which require to kill significand number of enemy. 

Added goal which require to arrive planet. 

Added arrow which show direction of planet. 

Added multiple gun to player in advanced levels. 

Added save the earth mode which require to survive against spawning enemies until achive the number of kill.
